title: Generate Monthly Owner Statement
description: It's the end of the month, and the agent needs to generate a financial statement for a property owner.

tasks.description: Select the property owner and the correct reporting period (e.g., last month).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the owner and date range.

tasks.description: Compile all income (rent) and expenses (management fees, repairs) for the property during that period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully gathers all financial transactions for the property.

tasks.description: Generate a formatted owner statement and send it to the property owner's email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and delivers an accurate financial report.
